app: WordPress User Post Gallery - UPG Plugin
seo: CVE-2022-4060,WordPress,远程代码执行漏洞,RCE,插件漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测WordPress User Post Gallery - UPG Plugin <= 2.19版本是否存在远程代码执行（RCE）漏洞，通过发送特定请求判断目标系统是否受漏洞影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the WordPress User Post Gallery - UPG Plugin <= 2.19 version has a Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability, and determines if the target system is affected by sending specific requests.
